newsitem.title: USA: NBC, Microsoft launch news service.
newsitem.headline: NBC, Microsoft launch news service.

text.p: NBC, a unit of General Electric Co, and Microsoft Corp said Monday they launched a new business news service called MS-NBC Business Video that offers business news events, including live audio and video over the Internet.
The venture is part of a new company called MS-NBC DeskTop Video, formerly known as NBC DeskTop Video, the companies said at a press conference in New York.
The service is the latest joint venture between NBC and Microsoft. The terms of the venture were not disclosed.
Part of the material from the venture will be carried on Bloomberg LP terminals, the companies said.
The service is subscription-based, costing $24.95 per month per user, with corporate discounts. It will not have advertising, an NBC spokesman said.
